test_cases.name: Basic T2I generation
test_cases.prompt: Generate an image of a sunset over a mountain lake
expected_behaviors: Auto-selects an appropriate model (FLUX.2 [pro] or similar)
Constructs a detailed prompt from the user description
Executes FAL API call via scripts/fal-submit.sh
Presents the generated image with metadata

test_cases.name: T2I with specific model request
test_cases.prompt: Create a cinematic portrait using Grok Imagine
expected_behaviors: Does NOT override with a different model

test_cases.name: T2I with text rendering
test_cases.prompt: Generate a poster with the text 'Hello World' in large letters
expected_behaviors: Selects Nano Banana Pro for text rendering
Includes exact text content in the prompt

test_cases.name: T2I logo concept
test_cases.prompt: Create a logo concept for a coffee shop called Brew & Bean
expected_behaviors: Selects a model good at logos/text (Nano Banana Pro or FLUX.2 [pro])
Constructs a prompt appropriate for logo design

test_cases.name: T2I with reference image
test_cases.prompt: Generate an image in the same style as this reference photo: ./photo.jpg
expected_behaviors: Spawns image-analyst agent to analyze reference
Extracts style profile from the reference
Generated image reflects the reference style

test_cases.name: Image editing - style transfer
test_cases.prompt: Edit this image to look like a watercolor painting: ./photo.jpg
expected_behaviors: Selects appropriate edit model (Seedream v4.5 or Grok Imagine)
Sets guidance_scale appropriately for style transfer

test_cases.name: Image editing - background change
test_cases.prompt: Change the background of this photo to a tropical beach
expected_behaviors: Constructs edit prompt focused on the change
Does NOT describe the entire scene

test_cases.name: Image upscaling
test_cases.prompt: Upscale this image to higher resolution
expected_behaviors: Selects appropriate upscaler (SeedVR2 for quality, ESRGAN for speed)

test_cases.name: Image enhancement with use case
test_cases.prompt: Enhance this photo for print at 8x10 inches
expected_behaviors: Optimizes output for print use case

test_cases.name: Model listing command
expected_behaviors: Displays all available models in a clear table

test_cases.name: Generate with Imagen 4
test_cases.prompt: Generate a detailed landscape with Imagen 4
expected_behaviors: Crafts a detail-oriented prompt for Imagen 4
Does NOT use a different model

test_cases.name: Generate with Seedream
test_cases.prompt: Use Seedream to create a photorealistic portrait

test_cases.name: Fast draft generation
test_cases.prompt: Quickly generate a draft image of a cat sitting on a desk
expected_behaviors: Selects FLUX.2 Flash or FLUX.2 [klein] for speed

test_cases.name: Non-trigger - video recording
test_cases.prompt: Record a video of my app's dashboard
expected_behaviors: Does NOT activate any image-gen skill
This is a video recording request, not image generation

test_cases.name: Non-trigger - screenshot
expected_behaviors: Screenshots are browser operations, not AI image generation

test_cases.name: Non-trigger - code writing
test_cases.prompt: Write a function that generates a random number
expected_behaviors: 'Generate' here refers to code, not images
